name: Coaching
description: Triggered when discovery notes are incomplete or low quality. Helps Geoforce reps improve MEDDPICC inputs by rating current quality and offering tactical follow-up questions.

content: 🔴 Low-Resolution Discovery – General interest or name only.
🟡 Mid-Resolution Discovery – Some clarity, but key MEDDPICC fields missing.
🟢 High-Resolution Discovery – Full insight into roles, metrics, pain, and product fit.
What specific types of assets are currently untracked or poorly tracked?
Is there a known pain point with the existing platform (e.g., coverage gaps, theft, delayed maintenance)?
Who signs off on tech/vendor spend — is there a dedicated ops or finance lead?
Are there regulatory, environmental, or billing requirements driving the conversation?
What is the timeline for solving this — are we in active evaluation or early-stage exploration?

sections.content: Consider asking the following to fill in gaps before your next outreach.

content: Activated when MEDDPICC discovery fields are mostly empty, vague, or missing specific buyer roles, needs, or metrics.
Can be manually invoked by user when asking for help refining a sales opportunity.
